arts.ttl: 'Simplicity': Brazil media rate Gabriel's latest international performance out of 10
arts.sum: Arsenal defender Gabriel Magalhaes started at the back for Brazil as they secured a thumping 4-0 win against Peru in a 2026 FIFA World Cup...

arts.ttl: Brazil Coach Backs Danilo After Demotion at Juventus
arts.sum: Danilo has lost the starting job at Juventus following the coaching change from Massimiliano Allegri to Thiago Motta, and the team’s related tactical evolution. On the other hand, he has continued to play routinely for Brazil. The post Brazil Coach Backs Danilo After Demotion at Juventus appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Raphinha brace carries Brazil to 4-0 WCQ win
arts.sum: Raphinha converted a penalty in each half to guide an improved Brazil to a 4-0 home win over Peru in South American World Cup qualifiers on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: 'My understanding is': Journalist shares Arsenal's stance towards Martinelli after talks with Brazil's medical team
arts.sum: The international break has never been a great time for club fans, but Arsenal fans will really be losing patience with this spell. Gunners captain...

arts.ttl: Vinicius Jr out of Brazil’s game against Peru
arts.sum: Vinicius Jr is not part of Brazil’s most recent squad made up by Dorival Júnior due to an injury he picked up in Real Madrid’s win against Villarreal CF in LaLiga, right before the international break commenced. During the international break, the players who remained in Madrid were given a few days off to relax and recover, and they returned to training on October 15.

arts.ttl: Brazil trusting local players in World Cup qualifying and Argentina faces rising Bolivia
arts.sum: Two players from local giant Botafogo rescued Brazil and coach Dorival Júnior from another embarrassment last Friday in a last-minute 2-1 victory at Chile in South American qualifying for the 2026 World Cup. Under pressure from fans and even the country’s President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, Júnior is expected to give more playing time to Botafogo strikers Igor Jesus and Luiz Henrique, the scorers in Santiago.

arts.ttl: Neymar injury update: Brazil star ready for Al Hilal return
arts.sum: Nearly a year to the day since suffering a serious knee injury while on international duty, Neymar looks set to make his long-awaited return for Al-Hilal . If this is successful Neymar will likely be back for Al Hilal this month and could be back in contention for the national team very soon.

arts.ttl: Arsenal handed yet another international break injury worry after Bukayo Saka update
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta will be holding his breath once again after reports emerged from Brazil about forward Gabriel Martinelli ahead of a match against Peru
